languages.text: "Леди Теодора уделяла большое внимание мерам безопасности. Об этом лифте знал лишь ее ближайший круг, а защитные системы не оставили бы и мокрого места от нарушителя при неавторизованном доступе".

"Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."
languages.original_text: "Леди Теодора уделяла большое внимание мерам безопасности. Об этом лифте знал лишь ее ближайший круг, а защитные системы не оставили бы и мокрого места от нарушителя при неавторизованном доступе".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

"Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

"Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

"Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

"Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

"Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

languages.text: «Lady Theodora puso especial interés en las medidas de seguridad. Solo su círculo interior sabe de la existencia del ascensor, los sistemas de seguridad habrían detenido a cualquiera sin acceso autorizado».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Theodora puso especial interés en las medidas de seguridad. Solo su círculo interior sabe de la existencia del ascensor, los sistemas de seguridad habrían detenido a cualquiera sin acceso autorizado».

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様はセキュリティ対策に細心の注意を払っていました。彼女の側近だけがこのエレベーターのことを知っており、不正アクセスを試みた者はセキュリティーのシステムによってすぐに始末されたことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様はセキュリティ対策に細心の注意を払っていました。彼女の側近だけがこのエレベーターのことを知っており、不正アクセスを試みた者はセキュリティーのシステムによってすぐに始末されたことでしょう」

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人生前非常重视安保工作，只有她最亲密的少数成员才知道电梯的事情。如果未经授权的船员打算进入电梯，安保系统会毫不留情地将其消灭。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人生前非常重视安保工作，只有她最亲密的少数成员才知道电梯的事情。如果未经授权的船员打算进入电梯，安保系统会毫不留情地将其消灭。”

languages.text: "Lady Theodora hat großes Augenmerk auf Sicherheitsmaßnahmen gelegt. Nur ihr innerer Kreis wusste von dem Aufzug, und die Sicherheitssysteme hätten mit jedem nicht autorisierten Eindringling kurzen Prozess gemacht."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora hat großes Augenmerk auf Sicherheitsmaßnahmen gelegt. Nur ihr innerer Kreis wusste von dem Aufzug, und die Sicherheitssysteme hätten mit jedem nicht autorisierten Eindringling kurzen Prozess gemacht."

languages.text: « Dame Théodora prêtait une attention toute particulière aux mesures de sécurité. Seuls les membres de son entourage proche connaissaient l'existence de l'ascenseur, et les systèmes de sécurité auraient de toute façon réduit en charpie quiconque aurait essayé d'y accéder sans autorisation. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Théodora prêtait une attention toute particulière aux mesures de sécurité. Seuls les membres de son entourage proche connaissaient l'existence de l'ascenseur, et les systèmes de sécurité auraient de toute façon réduit en charpie quiconque aurait essayé d'y accéder sans autorisation. »

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora, güvenlik önlemlerine son derece dikkat ederdi. Yalnızca yakın çevresi asansörden haberdardı. Güvenlik sistemleri ise izinsiz erişim sağlamaya çalışan herkesin işini oracıkta bitirirdi."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora paid great attention to security measures. Only her inner circle knew about the lift, and the security systems would have made short work of anyone who tried to gain unauthorised access."
